title: A Place for pottery
creator_credit: Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology and Douglas Cox
brief_description: The art of pottery from the quarrying of the raw material at Campbellfield, Victoria, to the finished article. Shows the clay being mixed, wedged to remove air bubbles, the potter at work, drying, firing, and glazing. Displays pottery in both its functional and decorative capacities.
